ygData.subject: Re: meetings? and messaging
ygData.msgSnippet: Huh? I didnt know meeting was cancelled. Thought you guys met. Im sorry i didnt make it to Freeport that day. I was at heldup at Qeynos. Im abck to FP now Have
ygData.messageBody:
Huh?
I didnt know meeting was cancelled. Thought you guys met.
Im sorry i didnt make it to Freeport that day. I was at heldup at Qeynos.
Im abck to FP now

Have u guys decided on a Guild name yet?
Should we be sending Emails to Verant ? 10 diff emails at least.

BTW.
Its there a shortcut/macro to answer private "tell" or "reply"messages?
I sometime recieved up to 5 diff msg from 5 diff people and i want to
tell/reply them the same msg.
'
Last nite was very bad. A player name Eldor "tell" me a couple of times and
i didnt "reply" him.
I was Tanking for Ziltus and 2 other guys. There were like 4 orcs -2
centurion, 1 Legionaire and 1 oracle hitting and punching me all at the same
time with us hiiting back at them. The Msg box Scrolls up very fast.I didnt
get to see in-coming messages.
Any one of u got a good solution ?
Eldor is NOT talking to me anymore :( im so sad. we were discussing plans
to go to Innoluthe swamps for Frogllocks and stuff.

Anyway..sigh.... If i have "Ignore" and Not "reply" any one of u guys..im
SORRY. its either im in combat fighting for my life, Running from a Giant,
Werewolf or that Damn flying turkey.

Yiyang
Monk'eying at Freeport and very sad :(...





-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 9:16 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Final Details on Singapore EQ Players Meetup


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Sorry, I dun have access to my email ay home over weekend. Anyway last Sat
>I'm having fever so didnt attend the meeting. Heard that later it was
>called off.
>
>Jus to share a weird experience. Last Sat I was travelling on boat from
>Butcherblock to Freeport. Been bored, I start to play with the options
>windows on the boat. When I click on the resolution button, my EQ crashed.
> ^&*$#@Q@ reboot system and found myself at the bottom of Ocean of Tear.
> Wah piang, quickly swim to the surface. Luckily managed to surface before
>my oxygen ran out. Look ard me all is sea. I try to gate in sea but fail.
> So I keep swimming, praying to God that no shark or any funny monsters
>will appear. Lucky me, finally I see an isle far far away. Keep swiming
>till I reach there. So scare that I climb all the way to the peak of that
>small isle. When I start to page GM, noticed GM not online. Again so
>fortunately I can gate back home, if I'm warrior already die cock stand
>there.
>
>So...next time on boat, dun try anything funny or u will end up in the deep
>blue sea. Imagine if u r not as lucky as me, kena whacked by shardk, how
>to find ya corpse? ;)
>
>Ziltus (High Elf Wiz, not Troll Shaman, hehe)
>
>On Friday, June 04, 1999 8:31 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
>wrote:
>> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>>
>> Oei..dont saboh me be leader..
>> Anyway,its easier to discuss if we were in EQ and talk..hehe..also more
>fun!
>> So if no objections,then heres the final details since most of u can only
>> make in at night
>> We can group together and see whether we are rdy to start a guild with
>GARY
>> as leader...muhaha..Leshrec also can..
>>

>>

>> Date:5-6-99,Saturday
>> Server:Innoruuk
>> Attendees:
>> Ziltus[Troll Shaman]

>> Garren[Human Paladin]

>> Yutaka[Human Monk]
>> Yiyang[Human Monk]
>>
>> Note:If you are not on attendees list or wish to be added or
>> deleted[Hey!!!],just reply!
>> Venue:Freeport-SouthGate[Since its nearest to port,would be easier for
>those
>> who juz came over from other continents]
>> What to do:Not too sure,but heres a few areas I think might be cool
>> BeFallen
>> Desert of RO
>> Oasis
>> Guk
>>
>> GuildName stuff:The saint suff is cool and espcially liked the usage of
>> "Valor"..hehe
>>
